transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir call disconnect ho gayi thi.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Aapko aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji sir aapki side se call disconnect ho gayi thi. Abhi aap bataiye aapko kya kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Issue mere ko lead nahi aa raha hai. Lead nahi aa raha hai. Jo main kaam kar raha hu usse related koi bhi lead hai to aap bhijwa dijiye nahi to band kar dijiye wo hamesha ke liye.
Customer: Ded teen teen mahine se wait kar raha hu main.
Customer: Single ek jo lead ke alawa mere ko kuch nahi milta isse.
Executive: Lead nahi aa rahi aap ye keh rahe ho. Sir main samajh rahi hu abhi main profile check kar leti hu. Aapko jo mere work se related hai, mere work se related hai wohi lead chahiye mere ko. Profile update karne se aap kya karte ho? Aap kya karte ho jo jaise koi building ka kaam kar raha hai uska lead dete the wo underwater ki lead hai ya nahi hai aapke paas wo bata dijiye mam clear mere ko.
Executive: Sir, don't worry aap.
Customer: Mam wo nahi hota hai don't worry. Aapne paise liye hai to aapki zimmedari banti hai. Yadi aap nahi karna chahte to mere ko refund kar dijiye mera paisa.
Customer: Ya to aap manager sahi nahi hai. Manager sahi nahi hai proper. Kyunki aisa to hai nahi ki India mein kaam nahi hota ya India mein main hi keval ye wali field related main hi juda hua hu aur koi jude nahi hai.
Executive: Aapki baat samajh rahi hu aap apni jagah sahi hai sir main wahi keh rahi hu aapne invest kiya agar business nahi milega to aapki baat sahi hai bilkul aur wo hamari zimmedari banti hai ki hum aapko buyleads de. Agar nahi aa rahi hai to hum us pe kaam karenge. Aapko change nahi kar sakta aap mera ek ghanta kharab karenge aadhe ghanta kharab karenge ki ye change kar do wo change kar do wo aap dekh lo mam. Maine jo change karna tha wo saal bhar se main change hi kar raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai wo main aapki product ki regarding jo hai mapping wagera category wo main change main check kar leti hu. Nishchint rahiye aap mat kariye wo main check kar leti hu.
Executive: Aap abhi mujhe bas ek clarification de dijiye taki abhi dekhiye aapke jo purane account abhi main aapki nayi account manager hu. Aapka feedback kaisa raha hai aapne mujhe bataya hai main usi ke hisab se kaam karungi. To aap mujhe thoda sa itna bata dijiye.
Customer: Har do teen mahine mein har do teen mahine mein manager change kar lete ho uske baad mein wo bol dete hai ki ye karna hai wo karna hai ab pura aane lag jayegi teen mahine se char mahine se ye dekh raha hu. Ye aap koi bhi aap yadi apna pad dusre ko deke jaate ho to aap bataya bata ke jaana chahiye ki iska ye matter hai. Mere ko nahi mil raha hai to nahi mil raha hai mam clear baat hai.
Executive: Sir kaam hoga aapko solution bhi milega. Aapne itna time wait kiya hai main aapko request karungi please aap mujhe ye month deke dekhe trust kijiye main aapka sahi cheeze guide karke sari cheeze aapko discuss karungi aur aapko changes aap khud hi dekhenge. Theek hai aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye jo abhi tak leads consume kari hai ab tak jo kar rahe the usse kuch conversion hua us par response kaisa aaya hai?
Customer: Mam usme koi wo nahi tha ki koi kaam karane wala nahi tha koi bolta hai hamare ko job chahiye koi bolta hai theek hai chalega lekin do mein se char mein se lead mein se ek banda aise aa jaye ki chalo usko job chahiye ya usko kaam chahiye wo feel hui hai. But theek hai kam se kam paanch mein ek lead to mere paas aisa aana chahiye ki jo proper work ke liye applicable ho baat chit kar sakte hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Aapki baat sahi hai sir. Ji ji.
Executive: Aapki baat bilkul sahi hai agar main ne bhi apna invest kiya hota mujhe zero reverse mein milta to maybe ho sakta tha main aap se zyada hyper hoti. Aap bilkul apni jagah sahi hai main aapko galat keh nahi rahi. Agar aapko buyleads nahi aa rahi hai hum wo cheez dekhenge hamari zimmedari banti hai as a account manager agar aapko koi problem aa rahi hai. Aap trust rakhiye main aapki sari cheeze check karti hu aur aapko proper guide karungi aur aap khud hi changes dekhiyega. Aapko ek cheez aur main jaanna chahungi jo leads aap keh rahe ho na galat aa rahi hai. To by ki side se response aa rahi nahi hai aa rahi nahi hai teen teen din se to main dekh raha hu ki kuch underwater related work ke liye hai hi nahi.
Executive: Content aa rahi hai product bhi alag aa raha hai.
Executive: Location ka bhi koi issue aa raha hai sath mein?
Customer: Mam single ek aadi aa rahi hai ship repairing ka ship repairing ka underwater hum karte hai surface pe koi kaam nahi hai. We are working underwater only mam aap ye bhi dhyan rakhiye.
Executive: Right right. Main check kar pa rahi hu aapke total 24 product hai. andar jayega driver andar jayega aur waha pe work karega. Koi aapko lead aa raha hai ship repairing ship repairing hota hai surface pe surface pe we are not concerned.
Executive: Ji main samajh gayi. Main check kar rahi hu aapke total 24 product hai na jo underwater ship repair service ke through kaam karte ho aap right?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Ek mujhe aap se puchna tha ye do product jo incorrect dikha rahe hai price ye 38000 day ke hisab se isme kya issue hai?
Customer: Koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai to main na aapko thodi der mein google meet ka link share karungi ye number aapka whatsapp ka hai?
Customer: Mam dekhiye mere ko ye cheeze rehne dijiye har manager aate hai wo kar dijiye ye kar denge isme kya date dalna hai mera nahi pehle main khud details se main aapko nahi keh rahi hu aap change kariye main aapko ye baat keh nahi rahi hu aap mat kariye wo cheez main dekhungi khud se ki kya kya cheeze isme improve ki hai. Bas main ye bol rahi hu ki main pehle ek bar details check kar leti hu uske baad agar aap free hai mujhe bata dijiyega main aapko video meet ka link share kar dungi.
Customer: Main nahi kar paunga video call ya to network hi nahi hai theek hai.
Executive: Ke liye call kar lungi main pehle ek bar check kar leti hu theek hai aap nishchint rahiye.
Executive: Thank you sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Wants underwater work related leads.

- Requests a refund if issue is unresolved.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and requested one month.

- Executive will check profile and guide customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to check profile and call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, profile, underwater work
